Text:
I figure I will ask this here just in case I can't find the info on the web. 
Ok, how in the hell do I convert(or burn) this wbfs file into a format that I can play on the wii. This is all new to me.  Never heard of this file before...Help would be appreciated. Don't understand why you didn't upload some instructions.
TheChoZen1, download wii backup manager, you can convert this to a full 4.37gb iso in a few minutes :-)
